title: Gun Control Means People Control - Phoebe Courtney
description:
Some of the chapters in this book include the following: Gun Control Laws Don't Work, Examples Of Why Citizens Need Guns, and When Guns Are Outlawed--Only Outlaws Have Guns. The right to use a gun is often the right to life itself. Tyrannies begin with the confiscation of firearms. As the author of the book pointed out as the Nazis swept over Europe, they merely confiscated the firearms registration lists in the various countries and seized all registered privately-owned guns. 

About the author:
Wife of Kent Courtney,  they launched their Free Men Speak newspaper, which was renamed the Independent American. Kent Courtney traveled a great deal during this period to address right-wing groups around the country while his wife edited the newspaper. Later the Courtneys divorced, and Phoebe relocated to Littleton in Jefferson County, Colorado, where she continued to publish "Tax Fax" pamphlets that the couple had begun years earlier.
Her books have sold more than 250,000 copies
